New Records: Messi played in his 35th Copa América match, setting a new record
Key Match Events: Julián Álvarez scored in the 49th minute, assisted by Messi
Lautaro Martínez scored in the 88th minute, assisted by Messi
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is seeking its third straight major title
Post-Match Reflections: Messi's best scoring chance was in the 65th minute, but was stopped by Crépeau
Miscellaneous Highlights: This marked the Copa América debut for Canada
Others: Argentina players celebrate after scoring a goal against Canada at the Copa América
Canada captain Alphonso Davies was not content with his side's display against the World Cup champions
